thread.title_full: Britney Spears Crashes Kate Hudson's Game Night - Yahoo Celebrity UK

title: Britney Spears Crashes Kate Hudson's Game Night - Yahoo Celebrity UK
text:
etonline-yahoopartner : 
Move over, Taylor Swift – there’s a new squad forming. 
Britney Spears and Kate Hudson got together for a game night on Saturday, proving that blondes really do have more fun. And by got together, we mean the “Pretty Girls"singer apparently crashed the soiree. 
WATCH: Kate Hudson and Nick Jonas Are Reportedly Hooking Up 
“That moment when @britneyspears shows up to your game night and you’re all like #itsbritneyb*tch,” the 36-year-old actress captioned her photo with the pop star. 
The new gal pals looked almost identical, rocking black tops and pink lipstick. The big difference? The 33-year-old singer was still sporting her colorful hair extensions . 
Like Hudson, Spears also took to Instagram to share two of her own photos from the night. 
“Two blondes… Too much fun,” she wrote. “Loved hanging with you last night @katehudson!” 
WATCH: Britney Spears and Joe Jonas Hilariously Prank Unsuspecting Bodyguards 
While these two may not have been buddy-buddy before, they do have a connection. Back in 2012, Hudson appeared on season four of Glee as Rachel Berry ( Lea Michele )’s intimidating dance teacher, Cassandra July. She and Michele got to channel their inner pop divas in a series of high-energy dance numbers on the Spears-inspired episode. 
At the time, Michele gushed about Hudson’s dance moves and even compared her to Spears in an interview with Perez Hilton . “The way she can sing and dance is literally out of this world,” Michele said. “I told her today I was like, ‘You are Britney Spears circa 2000, ‘I’m A Slave 4 U’ at her prime.’” 
We love that three years later, Hudson and Spears are now pals! 
While we wait in anticipation to see pics of their next hang out session, watch Michele’s Scream Queens co-star Ariana Grande completely nail a spot-on Spears impression!
